title: Not allowed to name and shame? Where else do I put it?
body:
So in champ select. This guy starts straight away. Says he is going to afk.
http://prntscr.com/9tnhwk
Then tries to get people to add someone, presumably so he can flame them. While spouting racist slurs.
http://prntscr.com/9tnim4
This continues for the whole champ select, until at 10 seconds, someone dodges.
http://prntscr.com/9tnj8h

So I am not sure where this should go. 
I probably won't run into him again. But other people will. 
So I don't think that's fair on them.
